name: ListLite
description: Minimal grocery list app focused on simplicity. Discovery Mode: Practical Utility. Ship Profile: Client-only. Just a digital notepad optimized for shopping lists with smart suggestions.
target_user: Shoppers who find current grocery apps too complicated
differentiation: Eliminates all complex features like meal planning, coupons, and store maps. Pure shopping list functionality.
subscription_fit: Cloud sync across devices, shared family lists, and unlimited list history
